entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Forecast issued 6:10 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023
